scenario_text.value:
(Yesterday, we ran for our lives from the
fog-covered amusement park.)

(One of our dear friends disappeared before
our eyes...)

(We made it back to the school somehow, but
everyone slept without saying a word.)

(Why couldn’t we save her...? I’m sure that’s
all anyone could think about that night.)
(Even so...)

(The morning always comes, no matter what
awful things happened the day before...)
Morning, Agumo—
Taaakuuumaaa!!!
You’re finally awaaake!
Agumon...? What’s wrong?!
Takuma! You have to help!
I can’t handle them by myself!!!
Agumon? What’s going on?!
It’s them! It’s all those kids!

Who’s a good little cutie? Who wants a nice
little treat?

C’mon now, no more tears, okay? One...two...
Peek-a-booo!
Waaaaaahhh! Uwaaaaaahhh!

Oh, come on! Cut that out! Syakomon’s trying
hard to dry them tears, so come on, already!

Hurk... This one peed on me! Someone, anyone!
A towel, a napkin, I’m begging ya!
What is...going on here?

It’s all the kids from the amusement park.
We have to take care of them now.
Oh...right, that makes sense.

(I hadn’t thought about it. My head’s been
swimming with thoughts of Saki...)

(All the critters we brought from the park
are still just babies.)

(At times like this, Aoi and Saki would
spearhead this kind of work...)

(Miu would play with them, and Kaito would
help out better than anyone expected.)

(Me and Minoru would join the fray, maybe
with some hesitation...)
(But now...)
Oh... Hey, where are Aoi and the others?
Everyone’s awake... It’s just...

(They’re all zoned out in the corner of the
room...)

(It’s weird, Agumon and the others are all so
frantic. Normally that’d be pretty funny...)

(...but for us humans it’s a different
story.)
Hey guys...

(Everyone’s so down. Why’d we have to lose
another one of us? Why Saki...?)

(Are Agumon and the others stronger than us,
somehow? At least they live in the present.)
...Oh, Saki...
Aoi...

She doesn’t register anyone talking to her
right now...
Labramon is beside herself with worry.

(Aoi’s practically a shell of her former
self.)

(Not that I blame her... She was as close to
Saki as any of us, maybe more.)
Excuse me, human children.

I’m so sorry things have turned out this
way...
Jijimon...?

I cannot thank you enough for saving us. If
it weren’t for you, many would have perished.

Yet in return, you suffered the loss of one
of your own. I cannot apologize enough...
No, it wasn’t your fault, Jijimon.

Yeah, man! If anyone’s at fault here...
it’s the asswipes who attacked us...

I fear...that I relied too heavily on your
courage, as well as your goodwill.

Had I only been able to risk my own life to
save that child yesterday...

If someone had to meet their end, it
should’ve been a senile old fool like me.
Please don’t say that!

I’m happy that you and the others are safe,
Jijimon. I’m glad you’re alive!
I don’t want anyone else to die!
Miu...
I feel the same way.

It goes without saying...I’m sad and upset
about losing Saki...
Still, I don’t regret going to save everyone!
I’m sure...that Saki feels the same.
Yeah... I bet you’re right.

Saki was doing everything she could to save
these little ones...

Indeed. Saki was truly brave...to the very
end.
I feel the same way. She was so cool!
Saki’s the reason everyone here was saved.

(Yeah. Saki did everything she could for all
of us...to the very end.)
(Even in her final moments!)
(That’s why... That’s why...!)

We can’t stay sad here! All of us have to
move forward!

Now, more than ever, we need to make it out
of here alive—to honor Saki’s sacrifice...
...and to save the world!
I’m sure that’s what Saki would want.

Yeah... I figure you hit the nail on the
head, Takuma.

That’s right! We gotta keep going—for us, and
for Saki!
Yeah...

Heh heh, you knew just what to say same as
always, Takuma. Right, Aoi?

So we’re just going to forget about her,
then...?
Huh...?

I get it. What Takuma says is certainly
correct. It’s just...

Just...that’s not going to bring Saki back,
now is it?
Aoi...
I think I need to go stretch my legs...
Wait up, Aoi!
Hold on! I’ll go with you!

(I can’t let her go off on her own like
this!)
I’ll go too, Takuma!

Oh no, what should I do...? Did I say
something bad?

Naw, you didn’t do nothing wrong, Miu. Don’t
sweat it.

Hearing Aoi talk like that... This stuff with
Saki’s gotta be a huge shock.
I think it’s probably more than that...
Huh?
Uh...forget about it.
